title.rendered: Town Hall Fair for U.S. Citizens in Ghana

content.rendered:
The Embassy will host a Town Hall Fair for U.S. citizens in Ghana in the evening on Wednesday, March 21, 2018. We cordially invite you to join us and our Embassy colleagues to learn about the U.S. Embassy’s priorities, the new Apply for Visa Now . Contact Only the number from this website and Alert system, and resources available to U.S. citizens.

 

When: 6:00 PM to 8:00 PM, Wednesday, March 21, 2018

 

Where: U.S. Embassy Ghana

No. 24, Fourth Circular Rd., Cantonments, Accra (Main Entrance)

 

RSVP Required: Space is limited, so if you wish to attend you must RSVP to TownHallAccra@state.gov no later than March 16, 2018, with your full name as it appears in your valid U.S. passport, your phone number and email address, and we will send you a confirmation email with details. In order to make the space available to a maximum number of our client community, only adult U.S. citizens holding a valid U.S. passport can be admitted.

 

Valid U.S. Passport Required for Access: Please bring your valid U.S. passport and the confirmation email to the Town Hall. No electronics (e.g., cameras, phones) or large bags will be allowed inside the Embassy compound.

 

We look forward to seeing you at the Town Hall!
